message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
Hi Alice, $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $120 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $180 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $150.  This is my final offer.
Alice, I understand you're firm on $150, but I'm still only able to go up to $130.  If you're not willing to go lower, I'll have to consider other options.
